name.richardson.james.bukkit.banhammer

Class PlayerListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • name.richardson.james.bukkit.banhammer.PlayerListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    name.richardson.james.bukkit.utilities.plugin.Localisable, org.bukkit.event.Listener

    public class PlayerListener
extends Object
implements org.bukkit.event.Listener, name.richardson.james.bukkit.utilities.plugin.Localisable
    The listener interface for receiving player events. The class that is interested in processing a player event implements this interface, and the object created with that class is registered with a component using the component's addPlayerListener method. When the player event occurs, that object's appropriate method is invoked.
    See Also:
    PlayerEvent
